text:
他明明是上樓了啊！
偏偏手機怎麼打都打不通，那費成益去哪了？
[redacted_name]一下子就急了。
龍山影視城這魚龍混雜，三教九流什麼人都有。 [redacted_name]又是社會名流，不會遇到什麼危險了。
[redacted_name]的幾個助理也顧不得再吃夜宵了，急匆匆的趕回酒店，準備叫上保安一起找人。
「怎麼辦？」
[redacted_name]眨著眼睛無聲問道，[redacted_name]低頭一笑，拉著她快步往樓下跑，偏偏[redacted_name]腳上還穿著拖鞋，根本跑不動，男人長臂一伸，就把她騰空抱了起來，幾個跨越就到了14層。
trans:
He clearly went upstairs!
But his phone just couldn't connect. Where possibly could Fei Chengyi have gone?
[redacted_name] immediately got anxious.
Longshan Film City is a mixed crowd, full of all kinds of people. Given that [redacted_name] is a public figure, could he have encountered some kind of danger?
[redacted_name]’s assistants could not have their late-night snacks anymore and rushed back to the hotel, going to call security to help look for him.
"What to do? "
[redacted_name] silently asked with wide eyes. [redacted_name] lowered his head with a smile, grabbed her hand, and quickly ran downstairs. Unfortunately, [redacted_name] was still wearing slippers, impossible to run. The man extended his long arm, lifted her off the ground, and in just a few strides, they were on the 14th floor.
